name: VE Hotels KarsIyaka
description: The rooms at VE Hotels Karşıyaka have been designed with all the details in mind, with a modern boutique architecture to make you feel good. As VE Hotels Karşıyaka, it is our indispensable goal to make the hours you spend here privileged, comfortable and enjoyable for you. VE Hotels Karşıyaka has adopted as its main principle to serve you, our valued guests, with its accommodation rooms, invitation dinners, meeting rooms, expert team and perfect service understanding, which have been designed with special architectural work according to modern quality standards, taking into account the requirements of the latest technology. Our VE Hotels Karşıyaka Hotel always pleases its numerous guests, both for business and leisure, with the quality of service it offers and its location. You can stay in our Single, French, Triple and Suite rooms where all your comforts are considered. You can have breakfast and dinner at our Terrace Restaurant. During your stay, we definitely recommend you to visit our elegant restaurant, which is appreciated for its delicious cuisine and elegance. Here, we offer you the best quality examples of the delicious tastes of Turkish and World Cuisine. Alacarte restaurant staff has adopted the principle of providing the most exclusive, cleanest, most comfortable and most friendly service of Izmir to its esteemed guests like you. It has been the basic principle of our responsibilities to maintain the guest satisfaction with its experienced and friendly service, which is focused on continuous self-renewal, to be the best in its field with its management that adopts continuous development as its principle, to provide quality service at every stage from the arrival of the guest to their departure. VE Hotels Karşıyaka continues to renew itself in this experience-filled adventure.
